message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think it would be perfect for you and I'm willing to part with it for $18,000.
Hi Alice, thanks for the offer, but $18,000 is a bit out of my budget. I'm interested in the product but I'm only able to offer $12,000 for it right now.
Hi Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $12,000 is significantly lower than what I'm hoping to get for the product. How about we meet in the middle at $15,000?
Alice,  I understand you need to make a profit, but $15,000 is still too high for me.  I'm willing to go up to $13,000. Let's see if we can find common ground.
Bob, thanks for the offer. I see you're serious about this. How about we split the difference again and settle at $14,000?  That's my final offer.

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate.  $14,000 is still a bit more than I can afford right now.  I'm going to stick with my offer of $13,000.  If you can't accept that, I'm going to have to explore other options.
